name: Limited reality
description:
Everything is temporary. Your presence only lasts for so long, so make sure to leave some of yourself behind.

 

In this hard but satisfying puzzle game, you will have to overcome several obstacles with different creative mechanics.

 

Currently featuring 9 levels with varying difficulty. More to come soon.

 

Controls:

Movement: WASD / Arow Keys

To leave yourself behind: Hold space and start to move

Set the last block to teleport: E

 

Are you ready to dive into Limited Reality?
